title: Which private college is best? - Quora

response.answer_text: According to US News & World Report, Williams College, the second institution founded in Massachusetts, is usually ranked as the best college in the United States. Finally founded in 1793, Harvard had successfully blocked its existence for nearly a half-century by arguing to the King that Massachusetts only needed one institution of higher learning. In comparison with the institution at the eastern end of Route 2, Williams was long known for its isolation and rural character, for educating the sons of farmers as well as elites, and for having a more rough and direct character. Critics preferred to charge it with housing too many “country bumpkins.” By the end of the 19th century, Williams had become a preferred destination for the East Coast’s protestant elites, altering this image somewhat, with the frequent criticism that it had far too many “nice boys” (perhaps a nicer way of saying “momma’s boys.” Thoreau once opined of Williams, “It would be no small advantage if every college were thus located at the base of a mountain[.] Melville felt similarly. During the graduation ceremony at Harvard, the student body gathers in two lines and applauds their professors as they march through. At Williams, the professor gather in two lines, and applaud their students’ achievements— past, and to come. Williams in the 21st century, has evolved from the regional institution of fifty years ago, into an international institution with a broad curriculum and co-ordinate programs with a variety of institutions, leading to almost any career path. Approx. 10% of the student body comes from abroad, with as many students matriculating students hailing from California as Massachusetts. Williams meets the full financial need of all admitted students, with net costs that are, on average, nearly $5,000 less per-year less than median costs at peers, and the full cost of attendance met for a significant portion of the student body. The College has undertaken significant initiatives to increase the economic diversity and inclusion of the student body, and no student should not apply to Williams due to financial need. Just the opposite.

I would suggest one college which is the best no doubt . UPES , Dehradun  The domain focused programs at UPES enable students to develop skillsets and gain exposure to work in sectors driving the growth of the economy. Advanced teaching methodologies, innovative and updated curricula and the focus on 'on-the-job exposure' gives students the edge to be readily deployable in their chosen field. FIRST Indian University to be awarded QS Five Star Ratings for Employability and Facilities and Four Stars for Teaching by QS Star Global University Rating SystemCo-branded B. Tech Computer Science and Engineering programs in academic collaboration with IT giants such as IBM and XebiaFIRST Design School in UttarakhandFIRST Indian Institution to offer 82 specialized programs across Energy, Infrastructure, Transportation and Computer Science & EngineeringONLY Asian University to receive the prestigious World Oil AwardONLY University in Uttarakhand to set up a Workover Oil Rig on campusONLY University in Uttarakhand to have mobile engine testing lab in Tatra Truck on campusIt has the best faculty , placement and infrastructure.
